data.text:
@FatSexyCanadian May you please provide me with your
Reservation number
First name and last name,  
Email address 
Phone number and the date of birth on the reservation so I can be able to assist you further

@FatSexyCanadian Thank you for reaching out to Flair Airlines. I apologize for the delayed of response,
my name is Christian and I will be assisting you

@janineglee Hi there, I truly apologize for the delayed response, 
Kindly provide me with your reservation number, email, telephone number and your D.O.B so I can assist you

@thomasqng Hi Thomas,

Someone is getting back to you shortly. Sorry for the delay in our response.

data.text: RT @TorontoPearson: Take a bite out of the Big Apple with the help of @FlairAirlines, who launch direct service to JFK Airport in New York…
@Avos99887 Hey Bryan! International, concourse A.
@DLounz Thank you so much for your loyalty, we hope you will have a wonderful experience with us.
@avshaq Can I ask what assistance you will require?

@avshaq Thanks for reaching out to Flair Airlines & I am happy to help.
This is a new destination.
@taiyoholic Thank you for reaching to Flair Airlines . If you need any further assistance please feel free to contacts us. Enjoy the rest of your day.

@taiyoholic Greetings. 

Please at the airport at the help desk.

@ANCairport Greetings. 

How can i assist you?
@AviationJobsMe If you still require assistance, please provide me with your name and last name, reservation number, phone number, email address and date of birth as they appear on the reservation.

@AviationJobsMe Thank you for reaching out to Flair Airlines. My name is Alo and I will be assisting you. My sincere and deepest apologies for the late response, as we have been receiving a high number of calls, emails and SMS.
@NicoleeMelissa I apologize for the inconvenience and the bad experience that you have. Rest assured we'll take note on this, and improve our services.
See you soon @YQG_Airport! ✈️🎉 https://t.co/AeL1pG3PrX
@LauraGeddess Will send your request to the right department.
@AndrewW54052353 Thank you for choosing Flair. Take care
@AndrewW54052353 Please do let me know if there is anything else I can do for you
@AndrewW54052353 We apologize for the delayed response and appreciate your patience. Currently we cannot confirm any information, however the information will be made available online
@_investwe @YQG_Airport We are so excited✈️😊

There's lots to love about Chicago and their pizza is only a slice of it. Use #DeepDishPizzaDay as an excuse to book a trip to the city where it was born. Dive into deep dish with flights from #YYZ-#ORD starting at $94*! https://t.co/raRBE2eX2R
*one-way, some conditions apply https://t.co/HYRGsYP9Hc

@aliki__h We're sorry to hear about this and apologize for letting you down. It’s not the experience we wish to create for any of our customers. Send our team a DM with more info or visit https://t.co/Dr4I9XOH6B to connect with our virtual assistant, Max, and we'll be happy to assist you!

eh-ok, our Canada SALE starts today! 👌
Use code 75OFFCANADA and SAVE 75% on base fare for all Canada flights for travel between April 19–May 18, 2022. Visit https://t.co/3OUZH19lGz to book.

*Ends 11:59pmMT 4/8/22 or while seats last. Conditions apply. https://t.co/08JuM0oUhO
@cdnbeer We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will try by all means to better your experience with us. Take care and stay safe. Flair Airlines.
@Canuck_PL We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will try by all means to better your experience with us. Take care and stay safe. Flair Airlines.
@Victoria59L We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will make sure that it does not happen again. Thank you for your feedback. Flair Airlines.
@r_dashkowitz We apologize for the inconvenience caused, i will escalate your matter to the compensation department.
@LesterN86952563 Please may we have the reservation number that you are seeking a baggage claim for.
@Jordy416 Thank you for your support Jordy416. Our condolences to you and your family.
@BrendanThorne4 Yes Sir we do charge for bags. Kindly proceed to this link https://t.co/eLJ52OXtPd for discounts
@BrendanThorne4 We understand your frustration and apologize for inconveniencing you. Kindly advise how you would like to be assisted

There's so much to CN do in Toronto, and our low fares get you there with cash to spare. Flair flights from Regina to Toronto start at just $59*! Visit https://t.co/HB4rL1iW2I and book your next flight today! #YQR #YYZ

*one-way. taxes & fees incl. Limited seats available. https://t.co/pXLgWwP8Tw

@PLouiseCampbell I'll be more than happy to assist you.
Please provide me your Reservation number, email address, mobile phone number and date of birth on file.

Craving a fresh lobster dinner? Want to escape from the city? With no shortage of history, character, culture, and impressive Fundy views, Saint John is the place to be! Fly Flair from #YYZ to #YSJ starting from just $59*! https://t.co/1GYStZlIzr
*one-way, some conditions apply. https://t.co/0aWwvplRWC
Happy #Ramadan to all those who celebrate. Wishing you and your loved ones peace, love, and good health during this special month.

data.text:
Travelling with a pet? It's totally pawssible! 🐾
Pets are part of the family, and that's why we are happy to welcome small dogs or cats on board for a small fee purchased at least 48hrs prior to departure. For more info on flying with furry friends, visit https://t.co/RMIumcZNFM https://t.co/q1n44VFJgQ
@fehla We’re very sorry and want to make things right. Please send us a DM to our customer service team or connect with our virtual assistant Max (link in bio) and we will be happy to help!

@bobbeddowcomic I will be more than happy to assist you. 

Can I please have your reservation number and please confirm your full name, email address, mobile number and date of birth?
@TourismLeth We cannot wait to host you on our flights!!

All Markets Sale – It just makes cents 💁‍♀️
Use promo code: ALLMARKETS40 and get 40% off base fare on ALL routes! HURRY, promo ends 11:59pm MT April 4, 2022. Offer valid on all flights for travel between April 6 – June 23, 2022. Limited seats & availability. https://t.co/BtHxgVgkAZ https://t.co/KpwfP8WyiP
@Bogg71 please check for flight availability on the website :) !

data.text:

To celebrate, Flair flights to Tucson are now on sale from $79USD/$99CAD. One-way, conditions apply. https://t.co/I3EfOBiU4u
📸: Jose Beltran https://t.co/iy0juhYlyI

The City has been proactively preparing the #yql Airport for an opportunity just like this & we'…

@garykarr Thank you, Gary! 😎

Kitchener-Waterloo, we 💚 you! From establishing our #YKF base with two planes last Spring, to last month's expansion announcement, @FlyYKF has quickly become one of our largest bases. Explore Flair's 12 routes to and from KW to cities in 🇨🇦, 🇺🇸 and 🇲🇽: https://t.co/WvUqrpNBTF https://t.co/iRopssZTzn

@FlairAirlines is increasing their direct service between Kitchener-Waterloo and Deer Lake to 4 time…

data.text:
🔔 Reminder 🔔
Travel is about to get a lot easier, and it's just in time for the SS22 travel season. Starting April 1, 2022, fully vaccinated travellers will no longer need to provide a pre-entry Covid-19 test result to enter Canada. 
Details: https://t.co/9eGuUgMkeY https://t.co/uHLdhGRyOO

urls.title: Government of Canada will remove pre-entry test requirement for fully vaccinated travellers on April 1 - Canada.ca
urls.description: Today, the Government of Canada announced that effective April 1, 2022 at 12:01 AM EDT, fully vaccinated travellers will no longer need to provide a pre-entry COVID-19 test result to enter Canada by air, land or water. Fully vaccinated travellers seeking to arrive in Canada before April 1, 2022, must still have a valid pre-entry test.
